text: Aleksandar Ratkov is a basketball player from Yugoslavia. Ratkov competed at the 2020 Summer Olympics.Aleksandar RATKOV He was born on 11 March 1992.Aleksandar Ratkov == References == Category:1992 births Category:Living people Category:3x3 basketball players Category:Forwards (basketball) Category:Medalists at the 2020 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic bronze medalists for Serbia Category:Serbian basketball players Category:Sportspeople from Belgrade
title: Aleksandar Ratkov
